headline: Beautiful & Functional Matcha Set
comments:
I absolutely love this matcha whisk set! It has everything I need to make the perfect cup of matcha at home. The ceramic matcha bowl with a spout is a game-changer—it makes pouring so much easier without spilling. The bamboo whisk creates a smooth, frothy matcha, and the whisk holder keeps it in great shape. The matcha spoon and tea cloth are nice touches that complete the set.
I got the pink set, and it‘s even more beautiful in person. The soft, cherry blossom-inspired color makes my tea time feel extra special and elegant. The quality is amazing—the ceramic is sturdy, the bamboo tools are well-made, and everything is easy to clean.

This set is perfect for matcha lovers, whether you're a beginner or experienced. It also makes a great gift for anyone who enjoys matcha tea. Highly recommend

headline: Good quality
comments:
This Matcha Whisk Set has been a wonderful addition to my morning routine! I‘ve been wanting to get into making matcha at home, and this kit has everything I need to get started. The bowl is a beautiful shade of pink (it also comes in green!), and it's the perfect size for whisking up a frothy cup of matcha.
The bamboo whisk works really well, and I love that it comes with a holder to help it keep its shape. The little spoon is perfect for measuring out the matcha powder, and the tea cloth is a nice touch.

The quality of the set seems really good for the price. The bowl is sturdy and well-made, and the whisk feels solid in my hand. I also appreciate that the bowl has a spout, which makes it easy to pour the matcha without making a mess.

Overall, I'm very happy with this matcha set. It's beautiful, functional, and has made my matcha-making experience so much more enjoyable. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone who loves matcha or is looking to try it for the first time!

headline: So cute
comments: This 5-piece matcha tea set is fantastic for making traditional matcha at home. The whisk creates a smooth, frothy texture, and the bowl is perfectly sized for whisking. Each piece feels high-quality and durable. I love the aesthetic design, which adds a calming ritual to my tea routine. A must-have for any matcha lover!

headline: Great matcha kit
comments: This is such a cute match kit. I love this matcha kit so much. It is so much nicer than I expected. The bowl and whisk holder is so well made. The color is vibrant and beautiful. The whisk works so well and really makes it easy to whisk in the matcha powder. It’s perfect for a gift or just for you.

headline: Beautiful & Functional Matcha Set – Love it!
comments: I absolutely love this matcha whisk set! The pink color is so delicate and elegant, making my matcha-making experience feel extra special. The bowl has a spout, which makes pouring super easy without any mess. The bamboo whisk is well-made and whisks up a nice frothy matcha every time. Plus, the ceramic pieces feel sturdy and high-quality. It’s a perfect set for anyone who enjoys matcha, whether you‘re a beginner or a long-time fan. Highly recommend!

headline: Quality matcha set
comments: I originally had some of the pieces in this set but I‘m still glad I got this full set. The items came very well packaged. I used to use a random bowl in my cabinet, but the matcha bowls are just the right size and enhances the experience. I also had a whisk but now I also have the whisk AND whisk stand. For some reason, having a full set is just nice. All the items are good quality. The pink is a cute color. This is also a good gift for my matcha lover friends, so I'll probably buy another set for gifting soon.

headline: Poor quality whisk
comments: I bought this for my daughter that loves matcha who was so excited to receive it for Christmas. The bowl was very cute however the whisk was unusable and fell apart on the second use even though she soaked it in warm water before whisking and used gentle pressure. The whisk the most important part this was very disappointing.

headline: Exactly what I needed to make my matcha lattes!
comments: Exactly what I needed!! This set includes everything I needed to make my own matcha lattes. The bowl is perfect size and the whisk is excellent quality. This makes perfect matcha and you can definitely tell the difference in taste when comparing it to using a milk frother. Now that I have a matcha whisk set, I just need to invest in higher quality matcha that comes straight from Japan! Look how gorgeous my latte came out. Very happy with my purchase!

headline: Cafe quality matcha right at home!
comments: I bought this matcha set because I was tired of spending $7 to $10 on an inconsistently made matcha from my local coffee shop— and boy do I wish I bought this thing sooner. I am now able to make a perfectly crafted drink every single time. The wisk/sifter combination allows me to aerate my drink and ensures there are no clumps in the powder. The set is also so cute and is large enough to make 2+ cups. I’d definitely recommend if you are a home brewer like myself.

headline: Perfect for matcha lovers
comments: This is a great set for matcha lovers. The color of the set I purchased is mint green and matches the green matcha powder! The little spout on the bowl makes it easy to pour your whisked matcha into your desired tea cup. However, I don‘t believe the bowl is microwavable (just FYI). It has everything you need to prepare matcha like a professional, and the tea cloth helps with accidental matcha spillage!

headline: Easy Tea Time!
comments: I love my new Matcha Whisk Set! The big pink bowl makes it easy to pour tea without spilling. The bamboo whisk helps me make my matcha super frothy and yummy. The spoon is perfect for getting just the right amount of matcha powder. This set makes making matcha tea so much fun!

headline: Simply awsome.
comments: This Matcha Whisk Set is perfect for matcha lovers. The bowl with a spout is practical, and the bamboo whisk creates a smooth froth. The whisk holder, spoon, and tea cloth are great additions, making it easy to enjoy an authentic matcha experience. The pink design is very attractive.

headline: Beautiful set
comments: The color and shape are beautiful. The stick and broom are also useful and of high quality. I also liked the packaging because it was sturdy and well designed. I’d even be able to give it as a gift. Highly recommend.

headline: Beautiful and Functional Set
comments:
Bought this pink set for my wife since she loves Oat Milk Matcha. Ceramic bowl with a spout, bamboo whisk, whisk holder, tea spoon, and tea cloth. Each piece feels well-crafted and high-quality. Bamboo whisk does a great job of creating a smooth, clump-free matcha.It’s easy to clean, durable, and safe for regular use.
Highly recommend it

headline: Super cute
comments: I love the quality, the kit is complete and it is a game changer. My matcha tastes much better

headline: Perfect to birthday gift, my sister loves it
comments: Super cute

headline: Very pretty matcha set!
comments: This matcha set comes complete with everything you need to make a great bowl of matcha, except the actual matcha powder of course. The minty green color on the ceramic parts are true to the description and very evenly coated. All of the ceramic parts feel high end. I know some may not like the spout type bowls, but I actually prefer them for ease of transferring bigger batches into individual cups. I don‘t typically drink my tea straight from the bowl. I also love that a cute little mat was included with the set. Really great purchase. You won't be disappointed.

headline: Beautiful, All Inclusive, Aesthetic
comments: This is a very beautiful tea set and it comes with everything you need to make some nice matcha. I love the wooden whisk and the color matching cup set. It even comes with a matching cloth. I plan to use it to make matcha for various tea drink that I like to drink.

headline: Excelente set de matcha
comments: Este set es perfecto para preparar matcha en casa. La calidad es excelente, el batidor es resistente y el cuenco ideal. Buen regalo para amantes del matcha.

headline: High quality
comments: This set is so cute! I am able to save money everyday making my own match. It’s very high quality and so aesthetically pleasing on my counter top. Stop buying matcha from the store and make your own at home!!!

headline: The best
comments: I‘ve been wanting a matcha whisk kit for a while now and finally decided to get one and I'm soo glad I was able to get my hands on this. Its worth the price! I would recommend this for everyone, the process of making my matcha every morning is so fun now!

headline: Beautiful and Functional Matcha Set
comments: This matcha whisk set is perfect for both beginners and matcha tea ceremony enthusiasts. The 20 oz bowl with a spout makes whisking and pouring effortless, and the bamboo whisk creates a perfectly frothy matcha every time. The whisk holder and matcha spoon are thoughtful additions that keep everything organized. Plus, the pink design adds a lovely touch to the ritual. Highly recommend for anyone who loves making authentic matcha at home!

headline: Cute Matcha At-Home Ceremony
comments: I’ve been wanting to have matcha the traditional way and enjoy celebrating international customs. Very easy to use and love the design of the mat. Matcha came out as it did in the tea ceremony I had in Japan! (Quite bitter as expected, I recommend adding lavender if you’re okay with deviating a bit)

headline: Lovely set for matcha lovers
comments: is a lovely set for matcha lovers. The bowl with a spout is super practical for easy pouring and whisking, while the bamboo whisk and holder create that perfect frothy texture.The soft pink color adds a bit of charm to the whole experience. Whether you‘re new to matcha or a seasoned pro, this 5-piece kit really elevates your tea ceremony. Overall, it’s a cute and high-quality set that makes matcha time extra special.

headline: This beautifully kit brings the authentic experience of the matcha tea ceremony to your home.
comments:
I loved it I bought it as a gift for a friend who is just starting out in the world of matcha. This beautifully designed kit brings the authentic experience of the matcha tea ceremony to your home. The 5-piece kit includes a bamboo whisk (chasen) to create that signature foamy texture, a whisk holder to keep the whisk‘s shape, a matcha scoop (chashaku) for precise measuring, and a tea towel to keep your equipment clean and tidy. Each piece is carefully designed to enhance the matcha making experience, whether you're a beginner or an experienced tea lover.
This kit makes it easier than ever to enjoy the soothing and healthy benefits of matcha.

headline: nice matcha whisk set
comments: I really like this whisk set, I am excited to make all of my matcha lattes now. Worth the value.

headline: cool gift
comments: I absolutely adore this BEIMENWAI Matcha Whisk Set! The 20 oz bowl with a spout is so practical and elegant, and the bamboo whisk creates the perfect frothy matcha every time. The included whisk holder, spoon, and tea cloth make it a complete set for any matcha lover. The pink color is so charming and adds a lovely touch to my tea ritual. Highly recommend it for anyone who enjoys matcha or wants to elevate their tea ceremony experience!

headline: Fabulous gift idea
comments: This is such a nice quality matcha preparation set. I am very pleased with the presentation and color. The whisk is durable and the mat it comes with is absolutely beautiful. Great value.

headline: Perfect and so adorable!!
comments: I am in love with this matcha set!! It comes with all you need minus the matcha and is so easy to use & clean. Not to mention it’s adorable! I feel like a real life barista and my drink turned out so yummy 😋

headline: Absolutely good
comments: The matcha set is amazing! I fell in love with this matcha set at first sight. It‘s beautiful! Great value!

headline: It wasn’t what I expected
comments: returned it. At first, it was fine, but after a few days, I didn’t like it, so I sent it back. It wasn’t what I expected.

headline: Great wisks
comments: The BEIMENWAI Matcha Whisk Set is a fantastic choice for both beginners and matcha enthusiasts. The high-quality bamboo whisk and scoop feel authentic and durable, while the 20 oz ceramic bowl with a spout makes pouring effortless and mess-free. The whisk creates a smooth, frothy matcha, and the included stand helps maintain its shape. Everything in this set is thoughtfully designed, making it easy to prepare matcha the traditional way. Plus, it comes beautifully packaged, making it a perfect gift for any tea lover. Highly recommend!

headline: Great Matcha kit
comments: I love this matcha set! The light pink color is so pretty, and it’s really easy to use, even for beginners like me. The bowl’s spout makes pouring simple without spilling, and the bamboo whisk mixes everything smoothly. It’s well-made, easy to clean, and perfect for making matcha at home. Definitely worth it! If you wanna get started with Matcha, I would definitely start with this kit. It’s sleek and clean. It’s great quality, especially the bowl. It is slightly overpriced, but it works how it’s exactly supposed to make sure you also heat up the whisk before you use it so you don’t crack it. Matcha is so good with this!
